inputs.description: The path to the file to be loaded into Revbayes
inputs.name: filename

name: rb_readDiscreteCharacterData
script:
rb_block <- 
"#######################
# Reading in the Data #
#######################

###### This just defines a single model for all sites #######

### Read in sequence data for both genes

data <- readDiscreteCharacterData('ARBOR_SCRIPT_FILENAME')

# Get some useful variables from the data. We need these later on.
n_species <- data.ntaxa()
taxa <- data.taxa()

# set my move index
mvi = 0
mni = 0"

rb_block <- gsub("ARBOR_SCRIPT_FILENAME", filename, rb_block)
rb_script <- paste(rb_input, rb_block, sep=rep("\n", 5))
